text:
Azam Taleghani (; 1943 – 30 October 2019) was an Iranian politician, activist and journalist. She was the head of the Society of Islamic Revolution Women of Iran. She was the editor of "Payam Hajar" Weekly, and a member of the Iranian parliament from 1980 through 1984. Taleghani was born in Tehran.
Taleghani was hospitalized in November 2018 after falling at her home in Tehran. She died of a cerebral hemorrhage caused by the fall on 30 October 2019 at the age of 76 in Tehran.
